command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/1/4/e/dataset_14e9e685-7f6d-4918-a90e-32e550cddcbd.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&        bcftools call  -m --gvcf 0 --prior 0.0011                      --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/8/7/9/dataset_879f7e0d-3971-46e0-90c2-608a06825988.dat'
